mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT (1) FROM CONSIGNMENTS c, ENUMERATIONVALUES E, COMPOSEDTYPES c2 WHERE c.P_STATUS = E .PK AND E .TYPEPKSTRING = c2.PK AND c.P_SPLITORDERTYPE ='M2'
AND E.code ='DISTRIBUTED'
AND E.code in ('ALLOCATED','BOOKED','SHIPPED','DPRECEIVE','STOREWAIT')
AND E.code ='DPRECEIVE'
AND E.code ='COMPLETED'
AND c.P_ALLOCATIONEMPLOYEECODE = #{distributorId}

SELECT COUNT (1) FROM CONSIGNMENTS c, ENUMERATIONVALUES E, COMPOSEDTYPES c2 WHERE c.P_STATUS = E .PK AND E .TYPEPKSTRING = c2.PK AND c.P_SPLITORDERTYPE ='M2'
AND E.code in ('DISTRIBUTED','STOREWAIT')
AND E.code in ('ALLOCATED','BOOKED','SHIPPED','DPRECEIVE')
AND E.code ='COMPLETED'
AND c.P_DELIVERYPOINTOFSERVICE = #{storeId}
mapper.update: UPDATE CONSIGNMENTS SET P_DELIVERYPOINTOFSERVICE = #{storeId}, P_STATUS = (SELECT t2.pk FROM COMPOSEDTYPES t1,ENUMERATIONVALUES t2 where t1.INTERNALCODe = 'ConsignmentStatus' and t2.TYPEPKSTRING = t1.PK AND CODE='ALLOCATED') WHERE P_CODE = #{orderCode}
UPDATE O2OCONSIGNMENTITEMS SET P_AGENCYCOMMENT = #{remark} WHERE P_CONSIGNMENT = ( SELECT pk FROM CONSIGNMENTS WHERE P_CODE = #{orderCode} )
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT (1) FROM CONSIGNMENTS WHERE 1 = 1
AND PK IN ( SELECT P_CONSIGNMENT FROM O2OCONSIGNMENTITEMS WHERE P_ACCEPTEDBY = #{acceptorId} )
AND P_STATUS IN ( SELECT t2.pk FROM COMPOSEDTYPES t1, ENUMERATIONVALUES t2 WHERE t1.INTERNALCODe = 'ConsignmentStatus' AND t2.TYPEPKSTRING = t1.PK AND code IN ( #{status} ) )
mapper.update:
UPDATE CONSIGNMENTS SET P_STATUS = "NVL" ( ( SELECT DISTINCT E .pk FROM CONSIGNMENTS c, ENUMERATIONVALUES E, COMPOSEDTYPES c3 WHERE E .pk = c.p_status AND c3.pk = E .TYPEPKSTRING AND c3.INTERNALCODE = 'ConsignmentStatus' AND E .CODE = #{status}) , P_STATUS )
WHERE pk = #{orderCode}
UPDATE O2OCONSIGNMENTITEMS SET P_AGENCYCOMMENT = #{remark} WHERE P_CONSIGNMENT = ( SELECT PK FROM CONSIGNMENTS WHERE pk = #{orderCode} )
mapper.select:
select C.PK, C.P_CODE AS P_CCODE,
O.P_SALESAPPLICATION, OE.P_JUNTANPRICE as juntanPrice, OE.P_PAYAMOUNT as payAmount, OE.P_SERVICEAMOUNT as serviceAmount, OE.P_DELIVERYCOST as deliveryCost,
T2.code AS P_STATUS,
O.P_BUYERNICK, A.P_PHONE1, A.P_FIRSTNAME, A.P_STREETNAME,
OE.P_QUANTITY as quantity, OE.P_TMALLQUANTITY as tmallQuantity,
OE.P_BASEPRICE as basePrice, OE.P_TOTALPRICE as totalPrice,
LI.P_DELIVERYMETHODS,
O2O.P_CUSCOMMET, O2O.P_SERVERCOMMENT, O2O.P_AGENCYCOMMENT,
LI.P_NAME,
C.P_SHIPPINGADDRESS, C.P_LOGISTICSINFO,
C.P_DELIVERYMODE as deliveryMode, LC.P_NAME AS P_LOGISTICSCOMPANY, C.P_TRACKINGID,
AU.P_CNNAME AS P_ACCEPTEDBY, O2O.P_ACCEPTEDCOMMENT, O2O.P_DELIVERYPIC,
PS.P_DISPLAYNAME as deliveryPoint,
C.P_CATEGORY as category, R.P_NAME as RegionName, CLP.P_NAME as CityName, DLP.P_NAME as DistrictName, DPT.P_CODE as code, DPT.P_CATEGORY as category, DP.P_NAME as name, ROWNUM RN from CONSIGNMENTS C LEFT JOIN ADDRESSES A ON C.P_SHIPPINGADDRESS=A.PK
LEFT JOIN LOGISTICSINFO LI ON C.P_LOGISTICSINFO=LI.PK LEFT JOIN O2OCONSIGNMENTITEMS O2O ON C.PK=O2O.P_CONSIGNMENT LEFT JOIN ORDERS O ON C.P_ORDER=O.PK LEFT JOIN ORDERENTRIES OE ON OE.P_ORDER=O.PK LEFT JOIN dpsizevarproductlp DP on OE.P_PRODUCT=DP.ITEMPK LEFT JOIN DPSIZEVARPRODUCT DPT ON OE.P_PRODUCT=DPT.PK LEFT JOIN LOGISTICSCOMPANY LC ON C.P_LOGISTICSCOMPANY = LC.PK LEFT JOIN POINTOFSERVICE PS ON C.P_DELIVERYPOINTOFSERVICE=PS.PK LEFT JOIN APPUSER AU ON O2O.P_ACCEPTEDBY=AU.PK
LEFT JOIN REGIONSLP R ON A.P_REGION =R.itempk LEFT JOIN citieslp CLP ON CLP.itempk=A.P_CITY LEFT JOIN districtslp DLP ON DLP.itempk=A.P_CITYDISTRICT LEFT JOIN languages L ON R.LANGPK = L.pk LEFT JOIN ENUMERATIONVALUES t2 ON t2.PK=C.P_STATUS LEFT JOIN COMPOSEDTYPES t1 ON t2.TYPEPKSTRING = t1.PK
AND CLP.LANGPK = L.pk AND DLP.LANGPK = L.pk WHERE 1=1 AND L.p_ISOCODE = 'zh' AND DP.P_NAME is not null AND t1.INTERNALCODe = 'ConsignmentStatus'
AND C.P_CODE= #{consignmentId}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT c.p_code, c.pk, DP.P_NAME as name, R.P_NAME as RegionName, CLP.P_NAME as CityName, DLP.P_NAME as DistrictName, A .P_STREETNAME, T2.code AS P_STATUS, A .P_FIRSTNAME, A .p_phone1, o.CREATEDTS as P_ACCEPTEDTIME, ADD_MONTHS (o.CREATEDTS, 1) AS limitedTime, OE.P_DELIVERYCOST AS deliveryCost, OE.P_SERVICEAMOUNT AS serviceAmount, OE.P_payAmount AS payAmount, PS.P_DISPLAYNAME as deliveryPoint, T3.code AS OrderStatus, ROWNUM rn FROM CONSIGNMENTS c LEFT JOIN O2OCONSIGNMENTITEMS O2O ON C.PK=O2O.P_CONSIGNMENT LEFT JOIN CONSIGNMENTENTRIES CE ON CE.P_CONSIGNMENT = c.pk LEFT JOIN ORDERENTRIES OE ON CE.P_ORDERENTRY = OE.pk LEFT JOIN ADDRESSES A ON c.P_SHIPPINGADDRESS = A .pk LEFT JOIN UNITS U ON OE.P_UNIT = U .pk LEFT JOIN ORDERS O ON C.P_ORDER=O.PK LEFT JOIN POINTOFSERVICE PS ON C.P_DELIVERYPOINTOFSERVICE=PS.PK LEFT JOIN REGIONSLP R ON A.P_REGION =R.itempk LEFT JOIN citieslp CLP ON CLP.itempk=A.P_CITY LEFT JOIN districtslp DLP ON DLP.itempk=A.P_CITYDISTRICT LEFT JOIN dpsizevarproductlp DP on OE.P_PRODUCT=DP.ITEMPK LEFT JOIN DPSIZEVARPRODUCT DPT ON OE.P_PRODUCT=DPT.PK LEFT JOIN languages L ON R.LANGPK = L.pk LEFT JOIN ENUMERATIONVALUES T2 ON T2.PK = C.P_STATUS LEFT JOIN ENUMERATIONVALUES T3 ON T3.PK = O.P_STATUS LEFT JOIN COMPOSEDTYPES T1 ON T2.TYPEPKSTRING = T1.PK AND CLP.LANGPK = L.pk AND DLP.LANGPK = L.pk
WHERE 1=1 AND DP.P_NAME is not null AND T1.INTERNALCODe in('ConsignmentStatus','OrderStatus') AND O2O.P_ACCEPTEDBY = #{acceptorId} AND C.P_SPLITORDERTYPE = 'M2'
AND t2.code in ('ALLOCATED','BOOKED','SHIPPED','DPRECEIVE')
AND t2.code ='COMPLETED'
AND L.p_ISOCODE = 'zh' AND ROWNUM < ${startNum}+${pageSize}+1 ) p1 WHERE p1.rn>${startNum}

select C.PK,
C.P_SHIPPINGADDRESS,
DP.P_NAME as name, C.CREATEDTS as limitedTime, A.P_PHONE1, A.P_FIRSTNAME, PS.P_DISPLAYNAME as deliveryPoint, ROWNUM RN from CONSIGNMENTS C LEFT JOIN ADDRESSES A ON C.P_SHIPPINGADDRESS=A.PK
LEFT JOIN LOGISTICSINFO LI ON C.P_LOGISTICSINFO=LI.PK LEFT JOIN O2OCONSIGNMENTITEMS O2O ON C.PK=O2O.P_CONSIGNMENT LEFT JOIN ORDERS O ON C.P_ORDER=O.PK LEFT JOIN ORDERENTRIES OE ON OE.P_ORDER=O.PK LEFT JOIN dpsizevarproductlp DP on OE.P_PRODUCT=DP.ITEMPK LEFT JOIN LOGISTICSCOMPANY LC ON C.P_LOGISTICSCOMPANY = LC.PK LEFT JOIN POINTOFSERVICE PS ON C.P_DELIVERYPOINTOFSERVICE=PS.PK LEFT JOIN APPUSER AU ON O2O.P_ACCEPTEDBY=AU.PK
LEFT JOIN ENUMERATIONVALUES t2 ON t2.PK=C.P_STATUS LEFT JOIN COMPOSEDTYPES t1 ON t2.TYPEPKSTRING = t1.PK
WHERE 1=1 AND DP.P_NAME is not null AND t1.INTERNALCODe = 'ConsignmentStatus'
AND A.P_PHONE1= #{phone}
AND O2O.P_ACCEPTEDBY= #{acceptorId}

SELECT p1.* FROM ( SELECT C.P_CODE AS P_CODE, C.pk, C.P_STATUS, DP.P_NAME AS name, P .p_name AS P_DELIVERYPOINTOFSERVICE, R.p_name || ac.p_name || ad.p_name || A .p_streetname AS P_SHIPPINGADDRESS, o.CREATEDTS AS CREATEDTS, ADD_MONTHS (o.CREATEDTS, 1) AS limitedTime, ROWNUM rn FROM CONSIGNMENTS c LEFT JOIN CONSIGNMENTENTRIES c2 ON C2.P_CONSIGNMENT = c.PK LEFT JOIN POINTOFSERVICE P ON P .PK = c.P_DELIVERYPOINTOFSERVICE LEFT JOIN ORDERS o ON o.PK = c.P_ORDER LEFT JOIN ORDERENTRIES oe ON oe.P_ORDER = o.pk LEFT JOIN dpsizevarproductlp DP ON OE.P_PRODUCT = DP.ITEMPK LEFT JOIN ADDRESSES A ON c.P_SHIPPINGADDRESS = A .pk LEFT JOIN REGIONSLP r ON r.itempk = A .p_region LEFT JOIN CITIESLP ac ON ac.itempk = A .p_city LEFT JOIN districtslp ad ON ad.itempk = A .p_citydistrict LEFT JOIN languages l ON r.LANGPK = l.pk AND ac.LANGPK = l.pk AND ad.LANGPK = l.pk WHERE 1 = 1 AND l.p_ISOCODE = 'zh' AND o.CREATEDTS BETWEEN TO_DATE ('2016-11-11', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE ('2017-11-11', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND DP.P_NAME IS NOT NULL
AND C.P_STATUS IN ( SELECT t2.pk FROM COMPOSEDTYPES t1, ENUMERATIONVALUES t2 WHERE t1.INTERNALCODe = 'ConsignmentStatus' AND t2.TYPEPKSTRING = t1.PK
AND code ='DISTRIBUTED'
AND code in ('TOSTORE','NOTTRADED' )
AND code ='COMPLETED'
)
AND c.PK IN ( SELECT c.pk FROM CONSIGNMENTS c WHERE 1 = 1 AND c.P_ALLOCATIONEMPLOYEECODE = #{distributorId} )
AND ROWNUM < ${startNum}+${pageSize}+1 ) p1 WHERE 1 = 1 AND p1.rn > ${startNum}

SELECT p1.* FROM ( SELECT C.P_CODE AS P_CODE, C.pk, C.P_STATUS, DP.P_NAME AS name, P .p_name AS P_DELIVERYPOINTOFSERVICE, R.p_name || ac.p_name || ad.p_name || A .p_streetname AS P_SHIPPINGADDRESS, o.CREATEDTS AS CREATEDTS, ADD_MONTHS (o.CREATEDTS, 1) AS limitedTime, ROWNUM rn FROM CONSIGNMENTS c LEFT JOIN CONSIGNMENTENTRIES c2 ON C2.P_CONSIGNMENT = c.PK LEFT JOIN POINTOFSERVICE P ON P .PK = c.P_DELIVERYPOINTOFSERVICE LEFT JOIN ORDERS o ON o.PK = c.P_ORDER LEFT JOIN ORDERENTRIES oe ON oe.P_ORDER = o.pk LEFT JOIN dpsizevarproductlp DP ON OE.P_PRODUCT = DP.ITEMPK LEFT JOIN ADDRESSES A ON c.P_SHIPPINGADDRESS = A .pk LEFT JOIN REGIONSLP r ON r.itempk = A .p_region LEFT JOIN CITIESLP ac ON ac.itempk = A .p_city LEFT JOIN districtslp ad ON ad.itempk = A .p_citydistrict LEFT JOIN languages l ON r.LANGPK = l.pk AND ac.LANGPK = l.pk AND ad.LANGPK = l.pk WHERE 1 = 1 AND l.p_ISOCODE = 'zh' AND o.CREATEDTS BETWEEN TO_DATE ('2016-11-11', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE ('2017-11-11', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND DP.P_NAME IS NOT NULL
AND C.P_STATUS IN ( SELECT t2.pk FROM COMPOSEDTYPES t1, ENUMERATIONVALUES t2 WHERE t1.INTERNALCODe = 'ConsignmentStatus' AND t2.TYPEPKSTRING = t1.PK
AND code ='DISTRIBUTED'
AND code in ('TOSTORE','NOTTRADED' )
AND code ='COMPLETED'
)
AND c.PK IN ( SELECT c.pk FROM CONSIGNMENTS c WHERE 1 = 1 AND c.P_DELIVERYPOINTOFSERVICE = #{storeId} )
AND ROWNUM < ${startNum}+${pageSize}+1 ) p1 WHERE 1 = 1 AND p1.rn > ${startNum}
